SA11n1098:32: punarjanmano rāgādinā ......... haṃkāraśuddhayā ahaṃkārabījasya avidyāyāḥ sarvathā prahāṇāt sugatāḥ |
SA11n1098:35: niḥśeṣaṃ vā ..........sarvavāsanāyā api kāyabāgbuddhivaiguṇyalakṣaṇāyāḥ svayamadhigatamārgoktāvapāṭavasya vā sarvathā prahāṇāt sugatāḥ |
SA11n1098:40: tānevaṃbhūtān sugatānādarataḥ paramaprasādena praṇipatyeti namaskṛtya sugatātmajasaṃvarāvatāraṃ kathayiṣyāmiti saṃbandhaḥ |
SA11n1098:42: sutāśca munīnāmiha labdhapramuditādibhūmayo bodhisattvā eva gṛhyante |

SA11n1098:54: nanu buddhāddharmo dharmataśca āryasaṃgha iti kramaḥ |

SA11n1098:89: abhidheyasya punaḥ śrutamayyādiprajñotpādanakrameṇa sarvāvaraṇavigamād buddhatvameva prayojanamiti prayojananiṣṭhā |
SA11n1098:96: nanu tvayā svātantrayeṇa kathitaṃ kathanaṃ kathaṃ grahīṣyantītyāha-yathāgamamiti |
SA11n1098:102: pravacanārthāvagāhanamapi ca avakratayā anena ātmano darśitam |
SA11n1098:110: ahaṃ tu piṇḍīkṛtya saṃkṣepeṇa kathayiṣyāmīti viśeṣaḥ |
SA11n1098:116: samastasādhujanagatamārgānugamanamapi ca anena ātmanaḥ prakāśitaṃ bhavet |
SA11n1098:118: atra ca sugataśabdena udbhāvitabhagavanduṇamāhātmyaśravaṇāt tadabhilāṣiṇaḥ tadupārjanapravaṇamānasāḥ sugatātmajasaṃvarāvatāraparijñānāya yatnavantaḥ asmin pravartante |
SA11n1098:129: nanu āgamānatiriktaṃ saṃkṣepeṇābhidhīyamānamapi kathamarthaviśeṣādyabhāvādviśeṣeṇa pravṛttyaṅgatayā kasyacidupādeyaṃ syāt ?
SA11n1098:151: kimarthaṃ karaṇāya yatna iti cedāha-khamana iti |
SA11n1098:152: ātmacittaṃ sugatātmajasaṃvarāvatārābhyāsarasena adhikādhikaṃ vāsayituṃ kṛtaṃ praṇitaṃ mayā prakaraṇamidam |
SA11n1098:168: parārthakāritvamapi leśataḥ saṃbhavati iti darśayannāha-atha matsametyādi |
SA11n1098:182: iyaṃ sudurlabhā suṣṭhu duḥkhena labhyata iti kathaṃcitprāpyā |
SA11n1098:189: yadi ca evaṃbhūtāyāmapi asyāṃ na hitaṃ vicintyate,

SA11n1098:221: niśāyāṃ yathā jaladāgamasamaye meghairbahule tamasi sati saudāmanī kṣaṇalavamātramālokayati kiṃcidvastujātaṃ prakāśayati |
SA11n1098:223: buddhā eva hi bhagavanto hitasukhopasaṃhārāya sadā bhavyābhavyatayā sarvasattvasaṃtānamavalokayantastiṣṭhanti |
SA11n1098:224: yadā yatra yenopāyena yasmai yaṃ bhavyaṃ paśyanti tadā tatra tenopāyena tasmai tamadhitiṣṭhanti |
SA11n1098:227: lokasya janasya puṇyeṣu hitasukhahetuṣu kuśaleṣu karmasu buddhirmuhūrtamekaṃ bhavet |
SA11n1098:236: yata evam, tasmācchubhaṃ puṇyaṃ durbalaṃ sāmarthyavikalameva,
SA11n1098:253: samyaksaṃbodhau buddhatve yaccittaṃ sarvasattvasamuddharaṇābhiprāyeṇa tatprāptyarthamadhyāśayena manasikāraḥ |
SA11n1098:255: mahāsāmarthyaṃ hi tadapareṇa mahīyasā parājīyate sūryeṇeva niśāndhakāraḥ |
SA11n1098:256: na ca saṃbodhicittāt pratipakṣo mahīyānaparaḥ saṃbhavati |
SA11n1098:286: yathā dadhnā vayamutplāvitā iti saukaryādadhikataraṃ dadhi bhūtamityarthaḥ ||
SA11n1098:287: yadi vā | yataḥ saṃbodhicittāt sukhaṃ pravṛddhamiti yojanīyam ||
SA11n1098:291: tathā hi bodhicittasaṃvarādeva bodhisattvo'mitapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārāt pravardhamāno devamanuṣyasaṃpattīḥ sukhamadhigacchan sattvāneva adhikataraṃ tābhiḥ saṃtarpayatīti |
SA11n1098:300: sukhameva tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ paraduḥkhaduḥkhināṃ dhimatāmiti pratipādayiṣyate ||
SA11n1098:306: saṃsāraduḥkhaśatāni narakādigatiduḥkhānāmasātaveditānāṃ śatāni aparyantasamūhāṃ startukāmaiḥ parityaktumicchadbhiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhagotraiḥ |
SA11n1098:311: bahūni sukhānyeva saukhyāni teṣāṃ śatāni devamanuṣyopapattilabhyāni anubhavitukāmaiḥ saṃsārasukhābhilāṣukairapi |
SA11n1098:321: tatra bandhanaṃ bandho rāgādaya eva yasyeti vigrahaḥ |
SA11n1098:328: saha narāmaraiḥ manuṣyadevairvartante ye asurādayo lokāḥ,
SA11n1098:329: tesāmapi vandanīyo namaskaraṇīyaḥ stavanīyaśca bhavati sma |
SA11n1098:353: sudṛḍhaṃ gṛhṇata yathā gṛhītaṃ punarna calati gṛhṇīteti prāpte gṛhṇateti yathāgamapāṭhāt |
SA11n1098:356: tadyathā kulaputra asti hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātam |
SA11n1098:358: na ca tadrasapalaṃ śakyate tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ lohīkartuṃ vā |
SA11n1098:359: evameva ekaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ kuśalamūlapariṇāmanājñānasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvakarmakleśāvaraṇalohāni paryādāya sarvadharmān sarvajñatāsuvarṇān karoti |
SA11n1098:360: na ca sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ śakyate sarvakarmakleśāvaraṇalohādibhiḥ paryādātuṃ tatkartuṃ veti ||
SA11n1098:361: bhavagatiṣu vibhūtikāmairapi nātra saṃśayo viparyāso vā kartavyaḥ ityupadarśayannāha-
SA11n1098:366: gataya eva pattanāni paṇyadravyakrayavikrayanagarāṇi iha pattanāni |
SA11n1098:368: teṣu vipravāso vipravasanameva śīlaṃ svabhāvo yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ |
SA11n1098:383: aprameyā pramātumaśakyā dhīrbuddhiryeṣāṃ taiḥ mahāprājñaiḥ buddhabodhisattvaiḥ |
SA11n1098:384: etāvatā parīkṣāyāṃ skhalitamapi nāsti iti suparīkśitamucyate |
SA11n1098:388: jagatāmeka eva sārthavāhāḥ karuṇāvaśavartino buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāśca, taiḥ |
SA11n1098:389: yathā khalu vaṇijāṃ hitāhitaprāptiparihārayorhitaiṣiṇo jñānavantaśca sārthavāhā netāro bhavanti,
SA11n1098:396: te sarve vaśirājamahāmaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante,
SA11n1098:397: evameva yāvat triṣvapi adhvasu sarvajñajñānaṃ dharmadhātuviṣayamavabhāsayati |
SA11n1098:398: atrāntare yāni kāni cit sarvadevamanuṣyasarvasattvasarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhakuśalamūlāni sāsravānāsravāṇi sarvāṇi tāni bodhicittotpādavaśirājamahāmaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante |
SA11n1098:405: kadalī yathā palamekavāraṃ datvā na punaḥ phalati,
SA11n1098:406: tathā bodhicittādanyadapi kuśalaṃ sarvameva kiṃcideva vipāke paripakve na punaḥ phaladānasamarthaṃ bhavati |
SA11n1098:410: sarvakālaṃ phalati devamanuṣyopapattiṣu sukhasaṃpattipradānāt kṣayaṃ na yāti tadanyakuśalavat,
SA11n1098:420: tadyathāpi nāma bhadanta śāradvatīputra mahāsamudrapatitasyodakabindornāstyantarā parikṣayaḥ paryādānaṃ yāvanna kalpaparyantaḥ iti,
SA11n1098:421: evameva bodhipariṇāmitasya kuśalamūlasya nāstyantarā parikṣayaḥ paryādānaṃ yāvanna bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanam ||iti ||
SA11n1098:428: bodhicittagrahaṇātpūrvaṃ kṛtvāpi pāpāni akuśalakarmāṇi narakādiṣu duḥsahaduḥkhadāyakatvāt sudāruṇāni atibhayaṃkarāṇi mahānti vā yasya bodhicittasyāśrayādāśrayaṇāt tadutpādanarakṣaṇavardhanasevanalakṣaṇāt uttarati nistarati |
SA11n1098:430: kṣaṇena ekasminneva kṣaṇe mahataḥ puṇyarāśeḥ samupārjanāt |
SA11n1098:433: śūrāśrayeṇeva mahābhayāni balavatpuruṣāśrayeṇa yathā mahāparādhaṃ kṛtvāpi kaściduttarati tadaparādhaphalānnirbhayo bhavati,
SA11n1098:435: tadevaṃbhūtaṃ bodhicittaṃ kathaṃ kimiti nāśrīyate na sevyate?
SA11n1098:439: tadyathā kulaputra śūrasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaśatrubhyo na bibheti,
SA11n1098:440: evameva bodhicittotpādaśūrasaṃniśrito bodhisattvaḥ sarvaduścaritaśatrubhyo na bibhetīti ||
SA11n1098:444: yugāntakāle pralayasamaye analo bahniḥ saptasūryodayasamudbhūtaḥ yathā sarvaṃ kāmādhātuṃ saprathamadhyānaṃ nirdahati,
SA11n1098:448: mahānti sumeruprakhyāni mahārauravādiduḥkhavipākāni yad bodhicittaṃ nirdahati tadvipākopaghātānnirmūlayati |
SA11n1098:456: bodhicittaprasūte pratikṣaṇamākāśadhātuvyāpake mahati puṇyaughe'ntarbhūtatayā lavaṇapalopamanyāyena aprajñāyamānatvāt,
SA11n1098:459: yadi vā nirupāyābhisaṃdhinā taduktam-nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karmeti |
SA11n1098:461: tathā hi -yadā bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānākāśadhātuvyāpinaḥ sarvaduḥkhāt samuddhṛtya sarvasukhasaṃpannān kariṣyāmītyadhyāśayena vicintayati |
SA11n1098:463: tadā bodhicittabalādeva tatsaṃtāne pāpasya kaḥ sadbhāvaḥ,
SA11n1098:472: yasya bodhicittasya anuśaṃsān svābhāvikān guṇān amitān apramāṇān maitreyanāthaḥ bhagavānajitaḥ |
SA11n1098:487: nāśrīyate tat kathamajñasattvaiḥ iti atrāpi yojanīyam ||
SA11n1098:491: tat samanantarapradarśitānuśaṃsaṃ bodhicittaṃ dvividhaṃ dviprakāraṃ vijñātavyaṃ veditavyam |
SA11n1098:501: tadyathā-sarvajagatparitrāṇāya buddho bhaveyamiti prathamataraṃ prārthanākārā cetanā |
SA11n1098:504: pūrvakamanaskārapuraḥsarameva yataḥ prabhṛti saṃvaragrahaṇapūrvakaṃ saṃbhāreṣu pravartate,
SA11n1098:510: tena pūrvakaṃ bodhicittaṃ na bhavatīti śaṅkāṃ nirasyati |
SA11n1098:513: durlabhāḥ kulaputra te sattvāḥ sattvaloke ye anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ praṇidadhati |
SA11n1098:514: tato'pi durlabhatamāste sattvāḥ ye anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimanuprasthitāḥ ||iti ||
SA11n1098:518: yathā kaścit puruṣaḥ abhimatadeśaprāptaye gantukāmaḥ gamanābhiprāyaḥ,
SA11n1098:526: prāktanaṃ praṇidhicittasya nidarśanaṃ paścāttanaṃ prasthānacetasaḥ iti saṃkhyārthaḥ ||
SA11n1098:527: tadetat praṇidhicittaṃ pratipattivikalamapi saṃsāre mahāphalaṃ bhagavatā varṇitamityāha-
SA11n1098:535: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāramabhibhavati,
SA11n1098:541: tasmād yo'pi pāramitāsu sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā śikṣitumasamarthaḥ,
SA11n1098:546: asahaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvadā dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum,
SA11n1098:548: tasmāttarhi tvaṃ mahārāja evameva saṃbodhicchandaṃ śraddhāṃ prārthanāṃ praṇidhiṃ ca,
SA11n1098:549: gacchannapi tiṣṭhannapi niṣaṇṇo'pi śayāno'pi jāgradapi bhuñjāno'pi pibannapi,
SA11n1098:552: sarvabuddhabodhisattvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakapṛthagjanānāmātmanaśca atītānāgatapratyutpannāni kuśalamūlānipiṇḍayitvā tulayitvā anumodayasva agrayā anumodanayā |
SA11n1098:555: tataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ yāvat sarvajñatāpratilambhāya sarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dine dine traikālyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya |
SA11n1098:556: evaṃ khalu tvaṃ mahārāja pratipannaḥ san rājyaṃ ca kārayiṣyasi,
SA11n1098:559: ityādikamuktvāha-sa khalu punastvaṃ mahārāja samyaksaṃbodhicittakuśalamūlavipākena anekakṛtvo deveṣu upapanno'bhūḥ |
SA11n1098:565: yat punaḥ pratipattisāraṃ bodhicittaṃ tadatitarāṃ vipulaphalameveti siddhamityāha-
SA11n1098:576: na vidyate paryantaḥ iyattā asyeti aparyantasya ākāśadhātuvyāpinaḥ sattvadhātoḥ |
SA11n1098:585: gacchato'pi tiṣṭhato'pi niṣaṇṇasyāpi bhuñjānasyāpi mūrcchādyavasthāyāmapītyādi draṣṭavyam |
SA11n1098:595: pratipattisārasya kumāra na durlabhā bhavati anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti [samādhi-10] ||
SA11n1098:599: idameva aprameyapuṇyatvaṃ svayameva ātmanaiva tathāgato buddho bhagavānuktavān kathitavān |
SA11n1098:603: hīne śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne adhimuktiḥ śraddhā chando vā yeṣāṃ te |
SA11n1098:607: tathā hi-ye aniyatagotrāściratarakālena bahutarasaṃbhāropārjanabhītā mahāyānāccittaṃ vyāvartya laghutarakālena alpatarasaṃbhārasādhye śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne cittamutpādayanti,
SA11n1098:614: katipayajanānāṃ mastakapīḍāṃ nāśayāmi mantreṇa agadena vā,
SA11n1098:615: ityevaṃ manasi kurvan apramāṇena sukṛtena asau kalyāṇābhiprāyo gṛhīto draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA11n1098:616: kiṃ punarapramāṇaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhaṃ pratisattvamapramāṇasya jagato hartumicchataḥ |
SA11n1098:617: api ca tacchūlamapanīya sarvasattvān sarvaguṇasamaṅginaḥ kartumicchataḥ kimaprameyaṃ puṇyaṃ na bhavati ?
SA11n1098:619: avicchinnāḥ puṇyadhārāḥ kimuta tasya na pravartante nabhaḥsamā iti |
SA11n1098:621: yathā saṃbhāravaipulye'pi pratikṣaṇamiti hetuviśeṣādatraiva mahāyāne mahānlābhaḥ |
SA11n1098:637: iyamīdṛśī hītāśaṃsā hitopasaṃhāramatiḥ yādṛśī samanantaraṃ pratipāditā bodhisattvasya bhaviṣyati iti |
SA11n1098:643: teṣāṃ mātrādīnāṃ svārthe'pi ātmanaḥ kṛte'pi eṣa manorathaḥ sarvaduḥkhamapahartum,
SA11n1098:650: svapne'pi parārthe saṃbhavaḥ kutaḥ iti yojyam ||
SA11n1098:654: evamatyadbhutakarmakāritayā durlabhotpādāt sattva eva ratnaviśeṣaḥ apūrvaḥ anupalabdhapūrvaḥ |
SA11n1098:660: yasya mahātmanaḥ parārthāśayaḥ anyeṣāṃ sattvānāmuktakrameṇa na svārthe'pyupajāyate ityasmāt ||
SA11n1098:661: atra ca anye'pi bodhicittotpādakasya guṇā vaktavyāḥ |
SA11n1098:662: yathā āryagaṇḍavyūhe bhagavatā āryamaitreyeṇa sudhanamadhikṛtya udbhāvitāḥ |
SA11n1098:663: te ca ativistareṇa śāstrakṛtā śikṣāsamuccaye darśitāśca,
SA11n1098:669: cittaratnasya bodhicittasya yat puṇyaṃ tat kathaṃ hi pramīyatām,
SA11n1098:685: sarvajagatparitrāṇāya buddho bhaveyamityadhyāśayena āśaṃsanāt prārthanāt kevalāt pratipattivikalādbodhicittādityarthaḥ |
SA11n1098:692: iyaṃ viśiṣyate pūjā yasyānto'pi na vidyate ||iti ||
SA11n1098:693: kiṃ punaḥ sarvaduḥkhitajanānāṃ sarvaduḥkhamapanīya sarvasukhasaṃpannān kariṣyāmītyudyogakaraṇādatiśayavat puṇyaṃ na bhavati ||
SA11n1098:701: kuto vā tādṛśaṃ mitraṃ puṇyaṃ vā tādṛśaṃ kutaḥ ||30 ||
SA11n1098:707: ata eva sukhecchayaiva sukhābhilāṣeṇaiva svasukhaṃ ghnanti śatruvat |
SA11n1098:710: ato yaḥ puṇyātmā akāraṇavatsalaḥ teṣāṃ viparyastānāṃ sukharaṅkāṇāṃ sukhabhilāṣukāṇāṃ sarvaśo'labdhasukhānāṃ pīḍitānāṃ duḥkhitānām |
SA11n1098:711: anekaśa iti anekairduḥkhaśatairbahudhā bādhitānāṃ tṛptimāpyāyanaṃ sarvasukhaiḥ kuryāt kāyikacaitasikaiḥ |
SA11n1098:713: anekaśaḥ anekaprakāraṃ tṛptiṃ sarvasukhaiḥ kuryāt iti yojanīyam |
SA11n1098:715: kiṃ tarhi sarvāḥ pīḍāḥ samastā duḥkhā vedanāścchinatti ca śamayati ca ||
SA11n1098:716: na kevalaṃ duḥkhapraśāntiṃ sukhatṛptiṃ ca karoti,
SA11n1098:719: apathamidameṣa panthā bhayamata ita eta gāta mā''sādam |
SA11n1098:734: pūrvaṃ bhayasaṃkaṭavyasaneṣu upakṛtamanena ityupakṛte sati pratyupakāraṃ karoti yaḥ,
SA11n1098:735: so'pi tāvat praśasyate lokena stūyate sādhurayamiti |
SA11n1098:744: parimitasattvānāmāhārapānamātradānasamādānamādiśan puṇyakarmā ayamiti pūjyate satkriyate janaiḥ satkarmaratairlokaiḥ |
SA11n1098:769: tataḥ paraṃ neti na sattvānāṃ gaṇanayā dadāti,
SA11n1098:774: tataḥ paraṃ neti sāvadhikaṃ na dadāti |
SA11n1098:791: yadyasyābhimataṃ tat sarvamanavadyamabhiprāyālhādanakaraṃ paramapremagauravasatkārapriyavacanapuraḥsaraṃ pramuditamanasā anuprayacchato bodhisattvasya kiṃ punaḥ pūjā na yujyate ?
SA11n1098:794: na tadvastu upādātavyaṃ yasmin vastuni nāsya tyāgacittamutpadyate |
SA11n1098:796: yāvat ayaṃ mamātmabhāvaḥ sarvasattvebhya utsṛṣṭaḥ parityaktaḥ,
SA11n1098:798: yasya yasya sattvasya yena yena yadyat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati,
SA11n1098:805: evaṃ ca guṇaratnasamuccayasthāne parahitasukhavidhānaikaparamamahāvrate bodhisattve svātmahitakāmaiḥ svacittaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ prayatnataḥ ityupadarśayannāha-
SA11n1098:810: ityevamuktakrameṇa sattrapattau sarvadā sukhadānapatau jinasya putre sugatasya sute |
SA11n1098:812: kaluṣaṃ pāpacittaṃ sve hṛdaye ātmacittasaṃtāne karoti utpādayati durātmā yaḥ,
SA11n1098:813: sa narakeṣvāvasati iti nātho buddho bhagavānāha brūte |
SA11n1098:817: tāvataḥ kalpān kaluṣacittakṣaṇasaṃkhyān narakeṣu tiṣṭhatīti bhāvaḥ |
SA11n1098:819: yāvanti mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo bodhisattvasyāntike pratighacittānyutpādayati avamanyanācittāni vā,
SA11n1098:820: tāvataḥ kalpāṃstena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ-vastavyaṃ mayā mahānarakeṣu iti ||
SA11n1098:821: nanu tathāgatasya duṣṭacittena rudhiramutpādayato nāvīcau cittotpādanakṣaṇasaṃkhyayā kalpān avasthitiruktā |
SA11n1098:826: na hi kaścit tathāgate sadevako'pi loko duṣṭacittamutpādayituṃ kṣamate |
SA11n1098:833: tathā ca sadevakasya lokasya arthaḥ upahato bhavet |
SA11n1098:837: yaḥ kaścinmañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamān stūpān vinipātayeddahedvā,
SA11n1098:838: yaścānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāyānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vyāpādakhilakrodhacittamutpādya ākrośayet paribhāṣayet,
SA11n1098:844: bodhisattvaṃ satkṛtya sarvabuddhāḥ satkṛtā bhavanti | ityādi ||
SA11n1098:851: yasya punaḥ puṇyātmano manaḥ prasādamupayāti bodhisattve,
SA11n1098:853: tasya prasannacittasya prasavedupajāyeta tato'dhikaṃ phalaṃ tasmātpūrvakapāpaphalād bahutaraṃ puṇyakarmaphalaṃ vipākaviśeṣāt prasavedutpadyeta |
SA11n1098:858: sacenmañjuśrīḥ daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvā utpāṭitākṣā bhaveyuḥ parikalpamupādāya |
SA11n1098:859: atha kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ maitracittastānyakṣīṇi janayet parikalpamupādāya |
SA11n1098:860: yo'nyo vā mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāyānādhimuktaṃ bodhisattvaṃ prasannacittaḥ paśyet,
SA11n1098:864: yasmānmahatā balena paramakṛcchreṇa pāpakaṃ pāpameva pāpakaṃ kutsitatvādvā duṣkṛtaṃ karma bodhisattveṣu kriyate,
SA11n1098:868: tadyathā kulaputra cintāmaṇiratnarājamukuṭāvabaddhānāṃ mahānāgarājñāṃ nāsti paropakramabhayam,
SA11n1098:870: ataḥ kimarthamanarthopārjanaṃ kaṭukaphalaṃ teṣu prayatnataḥ prārabhyate ?
SA11n1098:876: sāṃpratamutpāditabodhicitteṣu atiśayavatā ātmanā manaḥprasādamāviṣkurvan śāstrakārastān namasyannāha-
SA11n1098:881: teṣāṃ puruṣakuñjarāṇāṃ śarīrāṇi ātmabhāvān namaskaromi praṇipatya vande |
SA11n1098:890: yeṣu paramakalyāṇahṛdayeṣu bodhisattveṣu apakāro'pi parābhavo'pi kṛtaḥ tatkartuḥ sukhānubandhī paraṃparayā sukhamāvahatīti |
SA11n1098:892: saṃbhave vā kathaṃcit tadapakārameva nimittaṃ kṛtvā pravṛttānāṃ duṣṭābhiprāyāṇāṃ punaḥ kenacinnimittena tatprasādasamutpādanāt |
SA11n1098:897: abhyākhyāsyanti māṃ ye ca ye cānye'pyapakāriṇaḥ |
SA11n1098:899: athavā | yatrāpakāro'pi yeṣāmapakāro'pi mahākaruṇādhyāśayāt priyaputreṇa kṛta iva duḥkhaheturapi sukhameva janayati,
SA11n1098:901: evaṃ sarvathā sukhahetutvāt sukhārthināṃ ratnākara iva ratnārthināmāśryaṇīyā bodhisattvā ityupadarśayati |
SA11n1098:906: te mama trāṇaṃ bhavantu iti bhāvaḥ ||
